item.title: 2018 Google cloud 訓練營 筆記
item.description: 2018 Google cloud 訓練營 筆記 Become a Google Cloud Platform expert with hands-on training. GCP Essentials Gcloud cli PROJECT_ID: gcloud auth list gcloud config list project BASIC gcloud -h gcloud config --help || gcloud help config gcloud config list --all Managing Cloud Storage data Try creating a Cloud Storage bucket. Bucket names must be unique, so replace unique-name with something else, or append the name to make
